General.Name: SK Networks Co Ltd
General.Description: SK Networks Company Limited operates in mobility, home appliances, blockchain, ICT device distribution, trading, and hotel businesses. It engages in the rental of home appliances; provides car rental services; and sells mobile devices, as well as ICT devices, such as laptops, tablet PCs, and ICT accessories. The company also trades in industrial materials and chemicals, as well as used mobile devices; provides a range of services, including emergency roadside assistance, maintenance for imported cars, distribution of imported vehicle components and tires, and export of automotive parts, as well as tire replacement services. In addition, it operates Walkerhill Hotel & Resort that provides leisure, culture, and food, as well as invests in the areas of digital transformation, blockchain, and sustainability. The company was formerly known as SK Global Company Ltd. and changed its name to SK Networks Company Limited in October 2003. SK Networks Company Limited was founded in 1953 and is headquartered in Seoul, South Korea.
